reviews.text: Family of 4: 2 adutls, 1 Child and and infant. Served a purpose of giving us accommodation close to the snow, yet near the convenience of local shops. Clean but nothing spectacular. Staff generally helpful. Stairs to all units that we saw. Carparks next to units, but are a bit narrow for a big car. The alternative parking is 25mtrs away - but it can add up with the stairs and several trips.
reviews.title: Served a purpose

reviews.text: Full oven and stove, full size fridge, washing maching and dryer. 1bdrm small for 3 people moving around.
reviews.title: Good basic snow accommodation

reviews.text: Highlight was the indoor heated swimming pool - very nice.
reviews.title: Average and uninspiring.
